application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Silver Birch (overhanging into the garden of No. 9 Neville Avenue) - Reduce the crown by 20% and thin by 10% to contain the spread of the canopy as the tree is relatively close to both houses.
